title: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan Zhi Fanren Feng Qi Tian Nan
title_japanese: 凡人修仙传之凡人风起天南
title_synonyms: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality
Fanren Xiuxian Chuan: Fanren Feng Qi Tian Nan
Fan Ren Xiu Xian Chuan: Fan Ren Feng Qi Tian Nan
synopsis: A poor and ordinary boy from a village joins a minor sect in Jiang Hu and becomes an Unofficial Disciple by chance. How will Han Li, a commoner by birth, establish a foothold for himself in in his sect? With his mediocre aptitude, he must successfully traverse the treacherous path of cultivation and avoid the notice of those who may do him harm. This is a story of an ordinary mortal who, against all odds, clashes with devilish demons and ancient celestials in order to find his own path towards immortality. (Source: Wuxia World)

Sequel.name: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan Zhi Fanren Feng Qi Tian Nan Er

opening_themes: "Bu Fan (不凡)" by Zhengliang Wang (王铮亮)
ending_themes: "Fan Ren (凡人)" by Aojuan Duan (段奥娟)
